item.title: [KAFKA-7353] Connect logs 'this' for anonymous inner classes
item.description: Some classes in the Kafka Connect runtime create anonymous inner classes that log 'this', resulting in log messages that can't be correlated with any other messages. These should scope 'this' to the outer class to have consistent log messages.
item.summary: Connect logs 'this' for anonymous inner classes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
